name: Highway to Hell (brosilio)
description:
You're the last person alive. All you have is your Genius branded smart car. You're being chased by a black hole. You need to escape, but the road is covered in trash - drive carefully or you'll end up killing your car before the black hole can. Your car is your life: keep it alive.

Artwork by @0x3F: https://ldjam.com/users/0x3f

If, for some reason, the web player doesn't work on Itch, the game is also playable here: https://youshouldfear.me/games/ld46
